product_name: CamelBak FlashFlo LR Hydration Waistpack - 50 fl. oz. - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The FlashFlo hydration waistpack is perfect for runners, walkers and hikers looking for the convenience of using a reservoir with the comfortable placement of a waistpack. No more water bottles!
short_description: The FlashFlo hydration waistpack is perfect for runners, walkers and hikers looking for the convenience of using a reservoir with the comfortable placement of a waistpack. No more water bottles!
